
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x)
{
	register int c=gc();
	x=0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c=gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c=gc()){x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-48;}
}
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
if(a==0)
return b;
if(b==0)
return a;
if(a==b)
return a;
else
return gcd(b,a%b);
}
main()
{
	int a,b,t,c;
scanint(t);
	int k=0;
	while(t--)
	{	
		k++;
	scanint(a);
	scanint(b);
	scanint(c);		
		if((c%gcd(a,b))==0)
			printf("Case %d: Yes\n",k);
		else
			printf("Case %d: No\n",k);
	}
}
